basics.name: Levi Hinze
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Full stack .NET developer with agile team leadership experience.

work.company: CentralSquare Technologies (merged from Aptean Public Sector & Healthcare)
work.summary: Responsible for providing technical guidance and the overall technical architecture of the regulatory software Jurisdiction Online.
highlights: Migrated our SaaS application from on-premise, bare-metal servers to AWS with only 5 hours of downtime
Improved the stability of our SaaS application by reducing the number of threads in use by over 80%

work.company: Praeses (acquired by Aptean Public Sector & Healthcare)
work.summary: A technical leader for a distributed agile team. Also was the leader of an internal technical community that spread adoption of REST architecture through mentorship. Interviewed potential candidates and on-boarded new developers.
highlights: Introduced a technique to quickly migrate away from VB6 by utilizing a custom COM+ application to call our REST API
Provided technical guidance and architecture for a rewrite of a key module that is accessed over 10 thousand times a day by our users
Combined, my team modernized over 50 pages of our product to support all modern browsers

work.company: Praeses (acquired by Aptean Public Sector & Healthcare)
work.summary: Synergized talents with other customer success team members to rectify customer discrepancies.
highlights: Implemented a RESTful API to enable customization of dynamic form creation and submission
Leveraged mediator pattern to simplify implementation of cross-cutting concerns which created a notable reduction in boilerplate code needed to include cross-cutting concerns in new features

work.company: Bowman Systems (now part of Mediware Information Systems, Inc)
work.summary: Member of a team that preserved an ETL process for reporting PostgreSQL database that transferred ~3TB of data from multiple production databases each night

work.company: Bowman Systems (now part of Mediware Information Systems, Inc)
work.summary: Member of the Customer Support team that worked on solving customer issues.
